an7.76:1.7.pli: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso,
an7.76:1.7.de: Beide Ordenssatzungen wurden ihr ausführlich weitergegeben, gut aufgegliedert, gut gemeistert, gut bewertet, sowohl was die Regeln als auch den begleitenden Text betrifft.
an7.76:1.7.en: Both monastic codes have been passed down to them in detail, well analyzed, well mastered, well judged in both the rules and accompanying material.

an10.44:6.2.pli: ‘ubhayāni kho pana me pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso.

an10.44:6.2.en: ‘Have both monastic codes been passed down to me in detail, well analyzed, well mastered, and well judged in both the rules and accompanying material?
